attributes.action: invite Nepal to apply for membership of the Uk if they want Gurkhas to settle in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Possibly the Maoists who got rid of the Nepalese monarch might not wish more of the same.
For sure give retired legionaries a farm to secure the land with a civilian population.
That is resented by the locals usually but maybe not too weird.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
